price: (85) And the decree will befall them[1088] for the wrong they did, and they will not [be able to] speak.
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
footnotes: [1088]- Allāh's decree will come into effect upon them, and His promise will be fulfilled.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
